Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $80 by both myself and you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be a great addition to your collection. I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special introductory price of $75. Don't miss out on this opportunity to own a piece worth more than what you're paying for. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
